===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=よこぶえ|横|tr1=yoko|t1=sideways; horizontal|笛|tr2=fue|t2=flute}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> {{rendaku2|sort=よこぶえ|fue|bue}}

Compare {{m|ja|縦笛|tr=tatebue}}, which refers to an end-blown flute held vertically.
